name: SIMPLE PIRATE CHARACTERS
description:
All aboard! This pack contains 3 pirates willing to fight and save their people and 4 enemies with different colors. You can use them in different games and platforms.

Pirates (15 Animations):

– Idle

– Jump

– Fall

– Walk

– Run

– Push

– Pull

– Dash

– Defeat

– Hurt

– Confused

– Grip on the wall

– Shooting

– Jump shooting

– Pick Up

– Attack

Enemies (7 Animations):

– Idle

– Walk

– Run

– Defeat

– Hurt

– Confused

– Attack

If you need something, contact me: azucena.na90@gmail.com

Do you want to help me keep working and get exclusive rebates on my assets? Go through my PATREON, any help is welcome.

TERMS OF USE:

The purchase of this product is for PERSONAL AND COMERCIAL USE.
